titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/2/2005--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Proposes that: (1) equality of rights under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State on account of sex; and (2) reproductive rights for women under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or any State.
